com.model

Interface CommentDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CommentDaoImpl

    public interface CommentDao
    CommentDao give a representation of the comment model. This class will list all the method needed for CommentDaoImpl. We will define all the method without implementing them.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    team MyVegetable
